listing.name: Renovated app. on great location!

user.about: Hi my name is Emiel, I live in Amsterdam and I like to travel. Also I like meeting up with people from diverse backgrounds.

listing.address: Burmandwarsstraat, Amsterdam, North Holland 1091 SL, Netherlands

hosts.about: Hi my name is Emiel, I live in Amsterdam and I like to travel. Also I like meeting up with people from diverse backgrounds.

primary_host.about: Hi my name is Emiel, I live in Amsterdam and I like to travel. Also I like meeting up with people from diverse backgrounds.

listing.access: Guests will have acces to the whole house and the balcony.
listing.description:
Recently renovated cosy and bright 45m2 app. with 1 double bedroom, 1 bathroom with sink & shower, 1 separate toilet and 1 livingroom with open kitchen with acces to sunny balcony. Close to metrostop, supermarket and bike rental. Perfectly located!

It's a very nice place to retreat after a day of sightseeing and a good place to get ready for going out to explore the city. Although it's situated in a vibrant area, you won't be bothered by any noise from that. Because the app. is situated on the 2nd floor, the big windows in the living / dingroom provide a very open and light feeling in the app. and the sun will shine at balcony side from noon till it goes down, showing you the most beautifull sunsets you have ever seen!

Guests will have acces to the whole house and the balcony.

Don't hesitate to contact me by phone or (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) for any questions, also during your stay! 
Me or one of my close friends will always be around to assist if any unforseen circumstances will occur.

The neighborhood is filled with nice bars restaurants and even some clubs, it's an upcoming popular area of Amsterdam.
Also enough sightseeing around everywhere!

Metro 51 / 53/ 54:
Directly situated next to the apartment you will find metro stop "Wibautstraat", take any metro to direction Central Station and get off 2nd stop @ Waterlooplein for Flowermarket (shopping centre) or 3rd stop for Red Light District (old centre).

Tram 3: 
Only 5 min. walk from the apartment you will find tram nr. 3 (stop Wibautstraat / Ruyschstraat) that brings you directly to the Museumplein.
listing.house_rules:
Please respect the neighbours and my belongings. 
So no parties, and no loud noise between 10 pm and 10 am. 
But most of all, feel at home!
Smoking is allowed.

review.comments: We had the most amazing time staying in Emielâ€™s apartment. The place was beautiful, clean, spacious and had plenty of light. The view from the balcony was gorgeous and you instantly felt at home. The location is perfect - only a 2 minute walk away from the metro (4 stops away from the city centre) and the local supermarket and only a 5 minute walk away from the nearest tram! Emielâ€™s lovely friend Gabriel met us on the first day and showed us around the apartment - we were greeted with a complimentary bowl of fruit as well as useful pamphlets and brochures to help guide us around the city. Thank you Emiel for making our stay so enjoyable, we couldnâ€™t recommend your place enough!
